messages.message: Hey, are chatbots accessible via API? If not, will they be at some point and when would this be?
Yes! But heads up, implementing the streaming API may be difficult. @Balaram @joshbronko can share more
@Balaram I think it would be good to have a non streaming endpoint

Agreed @joshbronko - we considered for Q2 roadmap but didn't make the cut in favor of just making the product more complete (disclaimers, audit + analytics, etc). In Q3 we'll make the last mile better then the endpoint
there is a way to simplify the code i shared before
Out of curiosity - @joshbronko is the preference for non-streaming basically easier integration? What if we could help implement streaming more easily using SDK? Assume that's strictly better right?
sdk or another endpoint would be sufficient
id be more concerned with leaving a session open and it timing out mid flight
so an sdk would be the prefered path
